fields.Title of Presentation: Internationalizing the Business College Curriculum: Exploring One Vision, One Structure
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Consortium for Undergraduate International Business Educatin, Annual Conference
fields.Sponsoring Organization: Consortium of Undergraduate International Business Education
fields.Description/Abstract: In response to the increasing need by businesses for a globally-aware workforce, Boise State University's College of Business & Economics is undertaking the charge to develop "an integrated, complementary, multi-dimensional strategy aimed to insure, at every level, our graduates are gaining the international exposure necessary to be successful in future business endeavors."
